http://vimeo.com/invisible/kony2012
JOSEPH KONY IS ONE OF THE WORLD’S WORST WAR CRIMINALS AND I SUPPORT THE INTERNATIONAL EFFORT TO ARREST HIM, DISARM THE LRA AND BRING THE CHILD SOLDIERS HOME. SUPPORTING ‘INVISIBLE CHILDREN’ WE WANT TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE, TO HELP AND REBUILD THE LIVES OF THESE YOUNG PEOPLE. ALTHOUGH PRIMARILY THIS HAS STARTED IN AMERICA, A WAVE IS SPREADING AROUND THE UK FOR MORE ACTION TO BE TAKEN. LAST NIGHT THIS SUBJECT WAS TRENDING ON TWITTER GLOBALLY BUT WE NEED MORE. WE PLAN ON LOBBYING CULTURAL ICONS AND POLICY MAKERS SO THEY CAN INFLUENCE. ON APRIL 20TH ACROSS BRITAIN WE ARE GOING TO COVER THE NIGHT TO RAISE AWARENESS FOR THE ‘KONY 2012’ CHALLENGE. WE WANT OUR GOVERNMENT TO HELP STOP THESE KILLINGS FROM HAPPENING. WE WANT OUR GOVERNMENT TO PROVIDE AID AND TRAINING SIMILAR TO THE US GOVERNEMENT. WE WANT TO MAKE KONY FAMOUS, SO PEOPLE KNOW OF THE ATROCITIES HE HAS COMMITTED. CHILDREN SHOULS BE CHILDREN, NOT CHILD SOLIDERS. PLEASE HELP.
